author: Perez Hilton
title: The Isolated Vocals From Katy Perry's Grammys Performance Are Totally Unchained From The Rhythm…
text:
Simon & Schuster Cancels Milo Yiannopoulos' Book! 
Couldn't have happened to a nicer guy. 
It seems in the wake of his pedophilia comment scandal, Milo Yiannopoulos is being dropped by more than just the conservatives. 
Simon & Schuster have apparently finally listened to the masses boycotting the company and decided the professional troll is just too offensive to be published. 
The publishing house has, "after careful consideration" decided to cancel the publication of Dangerous , which was to come out June 13. Milo confirmed the news on his own Facebook, saying simply:
